report.title: Money for Nothin'
report.author: giga
report.bodytext: As I read the following I thought, wow you should try this, seems not that neurotoxic like amphetamine. /n /n /n /n /n Well I took 300mg, and waited about one hour. Nothing. Took another Tbl. with 300mg. Again nothing. Then I thought, well take one more, and if its still inactive resell it to someone else. So I took another 300mg. /n /n Waited, and waited, and the only thing that happened was, I was getting extremely tired, but was unable to sleep. Very unpleasant. /n /n So my suggestion is, for everyone who searches for something that keeps you awake, take Yohimbine-HCL instead - Not Adrafinil. This medication is in my opinion totaly useless. No idea who put this on the pharma market. /n /n -EOF
